subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: A stoppage-time goal by the substitute Brandão sent visiting Marseille through to the Champions League quarterfinals at the expense of Inter Milan despite a 2-1 loss on Tuesday.
snippet: A stoppage-time goal by the substitute Brandão sent visiting Marseille through to the Champions League quarterfinals at the expense of Inter Milan despite a 2-1 loss on Tuesday.
